description:
This extension provides a set of ODBTP, Open Database Transport
Protocol, client functions. ODBTP allows any platform to remotely
access Win32-based databases. Linux and UNIX clients can use this
extension to access Win32 databases like MS SQL Server, MS Access
and Visual FoxPro.
name: odbtp

1.1.4.releaseNotes:
* Added definition for ODB_ATTR_RIGHTTRIMTEXT.
* Added conversion of ISO date/time string to datetime for input parameters.
* Added odbtp_is_detached function.

1.1.3.releaseNotes:
* Added better support for processing GUID fields and parameters.
* The third argument of the mssql_bind() alias is now forced to be passed by reference.

1.1.2.releaseNotes:
Incorporates support for the new features that were added into
the ODBTP 1.1.2 C client library. The extension's source file was also
renamed from odbtp.c to php_odbtp.c.

1.1.1.releaseNotes:
Incorporates support for the new functions that were added into
the ODBTP 1.1.1 C client library.
